line_1: TO wander alone when the moon faintly beaming,
line_2: Where owls seek for covert, and night birds complaining,

line_1: And dim was that eye, once expressively beaming,
line_2: From his bosom that heav'd, the last torrent was streaming,

line_1: Through loop-hole in its cloudy texture beaming
line_2: A cataract of light, so softly streaming, —
